noun.description: A very brief two-piece swimsuit for women.
examples: Karen put on a yellow sun dress over her bikini

proper noun.description: An atoll in the Marshall Islands, in the western Pacific Ocean, used by the US 1946–58 as a site for testing nuclear weapons.

origin: 1940s: named after Bikini, where an atom bomb was exploded in 1946 (because of the supposed explosive effect created by the garment).
